datafield.subfield: Luminous flux control in a fiber-optic measuring transducer

An open optical channel of a fiber-optic measuring transducer is studied as an object of control. Optical mechanical modulating elements, used in FOMT and OOC, mirror surfaces, limit and mirror attenuators, spherical and cylindrical lenses were determined. They are used for control of the luminous flux in the measurement information perception zone.
